topics.body:
Some quick news and I'll summarize it as succinctly as humanly possible:
The 2016 presidential election in the usa apparently is going to come down to who is pro-gay rights vs who is anti-gay rights.

Basically if a presidential nominee is anti-gay rights they're going to lose because people under 30 are super majority pro-gay rights and therefore anyone from now on that's anti-gay rights will lose.

Tl:dr; gay rights movement is pretty much finished cause we'll never have another anti-gay rights president.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5522d3cf6368722b9ab80000#post_5522d3cf6368722b9ab80000
[bq="Thanotos Omega"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5522d3586368722714591c00#post_5522d3586368722714591c00
Umm Bullshit, we haven't had an openly anti Black/Hispanic/Asian president in decades and racism is still a massive issue,[/bq]
Dude.. I didn't say that homophobia would be gone completely; rather that the anti-gay rights movement is on a law basis falling apart and that if a presidential nominee is anti-gay in 2016 they will lose because they're anti-gay.

Tl:dr; gay marriage is probably going to be legalized sooner rather than later and if a presidential nominee is anti-gay they'll lose the 2016 election.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5522d89a6368722714782300#post_5522d89a6368722714782300
I hear that but we still have all kinds of anti black laws getting passed, thinking that just because it's harder to win a general election with anti gay sentiments doesn't make the problem go away, or even mean it's time to slow down the fight, until we get to the point that even claiming indifference on the subject is enough to end your political carrier we won't be nearly done,

I'm off to rest my arm up, take care everyone,

topics.body: Well pets, your master must bid you farewell once more. For we are at the home stretch with the spring cleaning and renovation prep at my Grandma's. But fret not, for even while we are away, you will still be in my heart.
